#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Make an Ad Campaign of a Clothing Range

#Text=Whether you design clothes and sell them , or if you are a fashion retailer , you need to capture the attention of your potential customers . this is quite hard , however , knowing that there are fashion empires coming up by the dozen .
#Text=You need to have a clever ad campaign to come off on the top .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Identify your target audience .
#Text=Different groups of consumers will have different tastes , and you will have to cater for each of these tastes .
#Text=If you stock items for many age groups , you have to come up with a range of ad campaigns , if resources allow , of course .
#Text=Come up with a theme .
#Text=Most reputable fashion stockists have a very unique theme , and most of them are formulated depending on the seasons .
#Text=For instance , if you are stocking items for winter , you could bring a theme such as Narnia , and set up various props , showing the White Queen dressed in luxury winter outfits .

#Text=This however may not appeal to a more mature audience , thus going back to the issue of knowing your target audience . ensure that you spend as much time as possible in the formulation of the theme , as it will eb the first thing that catches a potential client 's eye .
#Text=Hire a stylist to help you out .
#Text=You may not have resources to splurge on an A-list stylist , but ensure you get someone who has vast experience in the field of fashion .
#Text=They will know which clothing items are on trend but are still in line with your theme for the ad campaign , thus making the ad campaign quite popular .
#Text=Be unique .
#Text=Try something that others have not done before .
#Text=For instance , rather than hiring professional models to model the outfits , choose people from your locality .
#Text=This will show that you are very rooted in the community and it will save save you a lot of money since most will consider appearing on TV and magazines as being payment enough .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Check out as many magazines , websites and shows touching on fashion , check the ad campaigns they have from various fashion empires and try to get some inspiration from them .
#Text=Read online reviews and get to see what consumers think about them .
#Text=This will give you a rough idea of what your target audience would like to see .
#Text=If you are unable to settle on just one theme , make a mash-up of these themes .
#Text=However , do not include too many themes as it will seem disorganized and not serious .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Do not copy an entire ad campaign from another fashion houses .
#Text=This just shows your potential clients that you have no originality and may also get you in trouble with authorities in regards to copyright violations .
